Label: CT 105: Basis Swap of USD 1000.0 Notional, starting at 01/
Description: Basis Swap of USD 1000.0 Notional, starting at 01/02/15 with Maturity after 2 years. Leg 1 pays "reference rate A" + 2% on a quarterly basis. Leg 2 pays "reference rate B" on a semi-annual basis.
